resources.string: Do you really want close this application?
No Internet connection. Check if your mobile Internet / WI-FI enabled.
Sorry, I couldn\'t find any e-mail apps on your phone

VK mini is an mobile mini client of Popular russian social network - VKontakte.

This program are maded by Lemberg BMM Studion. Main developer is Bogdan Mukha. http://vk.com/infusi0n . Web Client Social Network "VKontakte" designed to make life easier for users of the Android platform with a slow mobile internet or official application does not like. Beautiful, simple, fast, reliable, with all the standard features. Messages, music, photo, support flash - now all at your smartphone one application. Main advantages: Small-volume Internet traffic for downloading content: -speed: , small volume occupied RAM: -takes little space on the smartphone. Functional VK mini program: - Ability to not download images to reduce traffic - News. Comments to News -Ability to see all comments. Guidelines. -Search - advanced. - Friends list, a list of online friends, offline. -My favorites - Messages dialogues. - Photos. Add photos to album - Audio recordings. - Video. - Subscriptions / Subscribers - Poll - Ability to write messages on the walls. Groups and public pages Out web site is www.bmm-studio.mobile

VK mini
